ai-info-tooltip.description-opportunity-education-note: We have also utilized AI to identify competences for education opportunities.
ai-info-tooltip.description-opportunity-intro: We have used a language model to create the content on this page in the following parts:
ai-info-tooltip.description-summary: Read more: <CustomLink>About the use of AI<Icon></Icon></CustomLink>
ai-info-tooltip.description-tool-intro: We have used AI to create the content on this page in the following parts:
ai-info-tooltip.description-tool-item-3: individual suggestions for opportunities that suit you

competences-identify-failed: AI competence identification failed, please add competences by editing the education manually.

home.go-to-service-directory: Go to Guidance and counselling services
home.need-personal-guidance-content: Guidance and counselling services help you reflect on career and education options. Narrow down the list of services based on themes that interest you and, for example, your place of residence to find the services that suit you best.

no-match.description: The page you are looking for could not be found or the link is outdated. Please check the address, open the menu, or go to the homepage.
no-match.title: Oops! Page not found

competences.info: You can choose which information from your Competence Profile you want to use in exploring opportunities by importing it to the Find Opportunities page.

competency-profile.help: Import competences from your competence profile to your overall data view. You can utilize previously saved competences when exploring opportunities. You can import all competences or only those you want.

tool.education-opportunity-duration-tooltip: The duration of the education opportunity indicates how long the education typically lasts. It is usually expressed in years or months and is based on the scope of the education and the normal pace of studies.
tool.education-opportunity-koulutusala-toolti: The field of education refers to the group into which educational programs are categorized based on the scientific, societal, or professional domain they relate to.

info.logged_in: The information from your competence profile does not transfer directly to this page. You can import it from the Competence Profile section. Try different combinations and update your opportunities.
info.logged_out: You can edit your selections in the Summary of Your Information section. Try different combinations and update your opportunities.

info-overview.other-data-from-profile-description: Your text additions to other competences and interests

import.confirm-description: Import competences from your competence profile to your overall data view. Select the competences you want from the list below.
import.failure-toast: Import failed â€” please try again
import.success-toast: Data imported successfully to the overall view

export.confirm-description: Select the data you want to export to your competence profile. You will find it later in the competence profile under 'Other Competences' and 'My Interests'.
